extracted-table.table-caption: Summary of main functional connectivity findings by groupwise comparisons at baseline. Regional functional connectivity (FC) differences were not seen at 12 months follow-up. Clusters from the hypoconnected regions in first episode psychosis patients at baseline are shown together in Fig. 6.

caption.p: Summary of main functional connectivity findings by groupwise comparisons at baseline. Regional functional connectivity (FC) differences were not seen at 12 months follow-up. Clusters from the hypoconnected regions in first episode psychosis patients at baseline are shown together in Fig. 6.

table-wrap-foot.p: *Corrected for multiple comparisons within region of interest; **Corrected for multiple comparisons within the whole brain.
